body.p: Adds a command /psong to XChat, which prints the song Rhythmbox is currently playing in an IRC channel.
Displays the currently playing song in big letters on your screen each time Rhythmbox starts playing a new song.
Updates your Gaim profile with the currently playing song information from Rhythmbox.

Rhythmlet is a gDesklets sensor for Rhythmbox written in pure Python. It can retrieve cover images locally or from Amazon.com, has configurable display strings, playback controls, editable ratings (requires included patch), and a seek bar.
Rhythmbox Applet is a small, simple GNOME panel applet that lets you control Rhythmbox's playback from a panel.
This XSLTconverts a Rhythmbox library database from its native XML format into an XHTML web page suitable for use on the web.
Drivel is a LiveJournal client for the GNOME desktop. It has a handy shortcut to insert the title and name of the song Rhythmbox is currently playing in the blog entry you are writing.
This little tool publishes information about Rhythmbox song changes to a Jabber pubsub node using the User Tune protocol.
Blue Remote is a bluetooth remote controller for Rhythmbox. With it you can operate the music player from a bluetooth enabled phone, such as the Sony-Ericsson T630.
FoxyTunes is an Extension for Mozilla Firefox. It allows you to control Rhythmbox (or your favorite media player) without leaving the browser.
